summary: This document is an email chain from October 2019 regarding the coordination of travel and security arrangements for a victim to attend an Epstein-related meeting in New York on October 23, 2019. The FBI Victim Services Division is facilitating the logistics, and an attorney is communicating on behalf of their client.

persons.name: FBI Victim Services Division
persons.role: Coordinating agency for victim travel and security
persons.context: Sends the main email arranging transportation, lodging, and security clearance for a victim to attend a briefing in a federal building.

events.title: Epstein Victim Meeting in NY
events.description: A meeting for Epstein victims is scheduled to be held in a federal building in New York.

keyFacts: The FBI Victim Services Division was actively coordinating travel and security for Epstein victims to attend a meeting in October 2019.
A meeting for Epstein victims was scheduled for October 23, 2019, in a federal building in New York.
An attorney was communicating on behalf of a client victim regarding travel arrangements to this meeting.
The correspondence highlights ongoing victim outreach and support efforts by law enforcement following Epstein's arrest.
